channel.title: Saving and Loading
channel.description:
There is very little out there when it comes to starting a server from scatch.
What I'd like to know is simply this: does anyone have a link to any information about implementing basic text file saving and loading to a server/framework, please?
I know it can be done other ways, I'm all about simplicity at the moment.
Thanks for reading.

item.title: Saving and Loading
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Rix_:

http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/essential/io/file.html

What happened to Gielixor?

Anyway, I have all that information to hand it’s just the stages of implementing to RSPS. I must miss something out everytime because it creates the .txt just doesn’t read from it properly.

And a simple rip from a base you think would be simple but there’s so much junk I assume I miss something also.

Read full topic
